material.mattext: We found that the standard deviation of X is 1.21. Now look at both probability distributions carefully. Which of the following do you think is true about the standard deviation of Y?
The standard deviation of Y is greater than 1.21
The standard deviation of Y is less than 1.21
The standard deviation of Y is roughly equal to 1.21
Note that 75% of the time, Y will get the value 3 which is very close to its mean 2.7. On the other hand only 25% of time X will get the value 2 which very close to each mean.

Incorrect. Note that 75% of the time, Y will get the value 3 which is very close to its mean (2.7). On the other hand only 25% of time X will get the value 2 which very close to its mean (1.8). Try again, and read the explanation below.
